title: I'm level 35, but the forums won't let me post, because I'm under level 7?

replies.body:
Sometimes a weird syncing issue can happen for the boards. I went into your account and did some tinkering, so you should be good to go and post anywhere for the most part! If it's still not allowing you, let me know or [send us a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and we'll do some more investigating. 

Happy posting! :)
Thank you, I appreciate your help.
If you couldn't post, then how did you make your post? :O

> [{quoted}](name=Chronofire,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=eBdGyY2c,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-11-30T00:29:20.029+0000)
>
> If you couldn't post, then how did you make your post? :O

Certain boards require a minimum level for posting. Help & Support only requires level 1! :)
